title: Stuck in PBE Reconnect
body: I was testing something out on the practice tool in PBE and my game was shut down by maintenance. It's been 2 hours since then and I turned my PBE account back on and noticed that I was stuck with the Reconnect Screen. Can anyone help me out with this? My PBE user is Sperans.

replies.body: Probably the maintenance caused a ghost game. There's nothing you can do except wait. It's been a while since you posted so if it's a ghost game I imagine it's resolved by now.
